title: Immigrant and Farmworker Organizations
prompt: A weathered wooden table in a farmworker's kitchen or community center, scattered with papers—health forms, documents, handwritten notes—shot from above in soft golden afternoon light filtering through a simple window, with calloused hands (out of focus) in the frame's edge; muted greens and browns of the rural interior visible, conveying quiet resilience and the weight of navigating systems while remaining largely unseen by policy.
